name: Agent K9
description:
Story: 

dogs of the world have been pushed away and are being discriminated against. They have to live outside the main cities hiding from the robo cats. In secret, the dogs have been plotting against the cats to put them back in their place. They have been stealing cat technology and adjusting them for dogs to use. 

You play as one of these special forces agents from the dogs side and will make use of the cats technology to fight them back. You are after the cat commander to stop them from suppressing you and your dog friends any longer. 

Controls:

 WASD - movement 

Left click - shoot 

Right click - aim 

Steak - increase hp 

Bones - increase ms 

There is no sprint, but if you collect the bones the movement speed will gradually increase. 

The goal is to kill all enemies before the timer's up. If you kill 50 enemies then the boss will spawn. Kill the boss to finish the game.

For a better experience play it in fullscreen.

After you finish the game, please fill in the survey:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1gUj-d_uSwfYB6I68gQivfh6kDrfJGbKCavL7w6X3MrM/edi...
